sections.general_description: Basic display preferences for link previews.
sections.performance_description: Optimize how link previews are fetched and cached.
sections.url_filtering_description: Control which URLs generate link previews.
sections.external_api_description: Use an external service when direct fetching fails (e.g., bot-protected sites).

settings.enable_batch_requests_help: Improve performance by processing multiple link previews simultaneously. When disabled, links are processed one at a time.
settings.blacklist_help: Specify domains or URLs that should not generate link previews. Use commas to separate multiple entries.
settings.whitelist_help: Only generate previews for these domains or URLs. Leave empty to allow all non-blacklisted domains.
settings.convert_media_urls_help: Generate previews for URLs that point to media files (images, videos, etc.).
settings.use_google_favicons_help: Show website favicons using Google's Favicon service to enhance visual recognition.
settings.cache_time_help: How long to store link previews before refreshing. Set to 0 to disable caching. Default: 60 minutes.
settings.open_links_in_new_tab_help: Always open previewed links in a new browser tab.
settings.external_api_fallback_help: When direct fetching fails (e.g. bot-protected sites like Reuters), use an external oEmbed API to retrieve link metadata.
settings.external_api_url_help: Custom oEmbed API endpoint. Leave empty to use the default (Iframely open API). The URL will be appended as a query parameter.

forum.site_cannot_be_reached: Unable to load preview. Please check the URL and try again.
